languages.text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова ксеноса звучат совсем негромко... и все же они, кажется, долетают до каждой пары ушей на мостике. Зароптавшие было члены экипажа словно проглатывают языки... и в ужасе бросают взгляд на застывших старших офицеров.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Слова ксеноса звучат совсем негромко... и все же они, кажется, долетают до каждой пары ушей на мостике. Зароптавшие было члены экипажа словно проглатывают языки... и в ужасе бросают взгляд на застывших старших офицеров.{/n}
{n}他的语调十分温柔，却一字不落地传入了舰桥上每个人的耳中。刚刚还骚动不安的船员仿佛骤然咬掉了自己的舌头，陷入了沉寂……他们带着惊恐的目光，望向几位呆立当场的高阶军官。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的语调十分温柔，却一字不落地传入了舰桥上每个人的耳中。刚刚还骚动不安的船员仿佛骤然咬掉了自己的舌头，陷入了沉寂……他们带着惊恐的目光，望向几位呆立当场的高阶军官。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pronuncia sus palabras en voz queda... y sin embargo parecen llegar a todos los oídos presentes en el puente. Los demudados tripulantes callan como si se acabasen de tragar sus propias lenguas... y contemplan impotentes a los oficiales paralizados por el pánico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il s'exprime à voix basse... mais la foule assemblée sur le pont ne manque pas un mot de votre échange. Dans un silence de mort, les membres d'équipage jettent des regards terrifiés aux officiers les plus gradés qui semblent pétrifiés par l'horreur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er spricht mit leiser Stimme ... und doch scheint er bei jedem auf der Brücke Gehör zu finden. Die verstummten Crewmitglieder sehen aus, als hätten sie ihre Zunge verschluckt ... und ihre entsetzten Blicke wandern zu den leitenden Offizieren, die wie gefrorene Statuen dastehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er spricht mit leiser Stimme ... und doch scheint er bei jedem auf der Brücke Gehör zu finden. Die verstummten Crewmitglieder sehen aus, als hätten sie ihre Zunge verschluckt ... und ihre entsetzten Blicke wandern zu den leitenden Offizieren, die wie gefrorene Statuen dastehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼の言葉はやわらかく…しかし、ブリッジにいる全員の耳に届いたようだ。口ごもるクルーたちは舌を飲み込んだような表情を浮かべ…その眼差しは、恐怖で凍りついた上級士官たちへ向けられていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の言葉はやわらかく…しかし、ブリッジにいる全員の耳に届いたようだ。口ごもるクルーたちは舌を飲み込んだような表情を浮かべ…その眼差しは、恐怖で凍りついた上級士官たちへ向けられていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözleri, dudaklarından yumuşak bir tonda dökülse de köprüdeki tüm kulaklara çalınmış gibi duruyor. Aniden sesi kesilen tayfalar, dillerini yutmuşçasına bakıyor ve... Gözleri, dehşet içinde donakalan kıdemli subaylara dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His words are softly spoken... and yet they seem to reach every pair of ears on the bridge. The hushed crew members look as though they have just swallowed their tongues... and their eyes dart to the frozen senior officers in horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözleri, dudaklarından yumuşak bir tonda dökülse de... Köprüdeki tüm kulaklara çalınmış gibi duruyor. Aniden sesi kesilen mürettebat mensupları, dillerini yutmuşçasına bakıyorlar ve... Gözleri, dehşet içinde donakalan kıdemli subaylara dönüyor.{/n}
